text: Soni chisimu chene Musa twampele chitabu, basi ni wapatikene mwalakwemo ukangani, mwanti lingawaga lilowe lyalyalongolele lyakuumila kwa Ambuje wenu (Allah lyangapa ilagasyo yekulungwa nnope ikaweje ku Kiyama), chisimu kungajilanyidwe chilikati chao, soni chisimu wanganyao ali mâ€™chikaiko chekulungwa chakuchikaichila chalakwecho
